mapper.insert: INSERT INTO want_shop( shopName, shopUrl, shopIcon, shopDescribe, shopBackground ) VALUES ( #{shopName}, #{shopUrl}, #{shopIcon}, #{shopDescribe}, #{shopBackground} )
mapper.select: SELECT shopId, shopName, shopUrl, shopIcon, shopDescribe, shopBackground FROM want_shop WHERE shopId = #{shopId}

SELECT c.commodityId, c.commodityName, c.commodityPrice, c.commodityUploadUser, c.commodityLike, c.commodityCollection, c.platform, c.shopId, s.shopName, s.shopUrl, s.shopIcon, u.userName AS commodityUploadUserName, i.commodityImgUrl, i.commodityImgSize FROM want_commodity_info c INNER JOIN want_user u ON c.commodityUploadUser = u.userId LEFT JOIN want_commodity_img i ON c.commodityId = i.commodityId LEFT JOIN want_shop s ON c.shopId = s.shopId WHERE i.commodityImgSize = 2 AND s.shopId = #{shopId} ORDER BY c.uploadTime DESC LIMIT #{page},12
